## `lap`

[`leprechaun`](https://leprechaun.opifex.org/#/) is a 'lightweight' version of `golem`:

*it generates code and does not make itself a dependency of the application you build; this means applications are leaner, and smaller*

The lap app file are below: 

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: true  
fs::dir_tree("_apps/lap", recurse = 0)
```

## `leprechaun` package dependencies 

```{r}
#| eval: true 
#| include: true
#| code-fold: show 
#| code-summary: 'show/hide leprechaun dependency tree'
library(leprechaun)
pak::pkg_deps_tree(pkg = "leprechaun", dependencies = TRUE)
```

### `lap` dependencies 

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| code-fold: true 
#| code-summary: 'show/hide lap dependency tree'
#| collapse: true 
#| comment: "\t"
pak::local_deps_tree(root = "_apps/lap", dependencies = NA)
```
